verbose_text: The increase of Scx expression upon TGFbeta2 exposure is abolished in the presence of TGFbeta inhibitors, which block TGFbeta signal transduction at the level of the receptors or at the level of the SMAD2/3 intracellular pathways in C3H10T1/2 cells.
evidence: TGFbeta inhibitors, which block TGFbeta signal transduction
